description: A Flask route implementation for a health check endpoint, using flask_smorest's Blueprint and MethodView to define a REST API endpoint that responds with a health status message.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A class defining a health check GET endpoint using Flask's MethodView.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the health check endpoint, returning a JSON message indicating service health.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
